pages.title: Navbar
pages.description: Main navigation bar for Bazaar theme
pages.content: Bazaar
pages.styles: #bazaar-navbar { z-index: 999; } .navbar-brand { color: #e74c3c; font-size: 1.8rem; } .navbar-light .navbar-nav .nav-link { color: #333; font-weight: 500; margin-left: 15px; }

pages.title: Footer
pages.content:
© 2025 Bazaar Market. All rights reserved.

  • About
  • Contact
  • FAQ
pages.styles: #bazaar-footer a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } #bazaar-footer ul { padding: 0; margin: 0; } #bazaar-footer ul li { margin: 0 10px; }

pages.title: Home
pages.description: Welcome to Bazaar – Your Global Marketplace
pages.content:
Welcome to Bazaar

Discover unique products from around the world, all in one place.

Start Exploring

Worldwide Sellers

Access exclusive items from every corner of the globe.

Secure Payments

Shop confidently with our trusted payment gateways.

Fast Shipping

Get your products quickly and reliably at your door.

Shop by Category

Customer Reviews

Real stories from happy shoppers

“Bazaar helped me find authentic gifts that amazed my family.”

Giulia, Firenze

“A beautiful mix of culture and commerce. I love it!”

Marc, Paris

“Fast delivery and stunning items – highly recommended.”

Lina, Berlin

Become a Seller

Join our global marketplace and grow your brand.

Get Started
pages.styles: #bazaar-hero { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f9e0d9, #fceabb); color: #333; } .btn-danger { background-color: #e74c3c; border: none; } #bazaar-featured i { color: #e74c3c; }

pages.title: About Us
pages.description: Discover the story behind Bazaar, your multicultural marketplace.
pages.keywords: about us, bazaar, mission, values, our story
pages.content:
Our Journey

From local markets to a global online bazaar

Our Mission

To connect cultures and communities through unique products, empowering artisans and entrepreneurs worldwide.

Our Values

Authenticity

We celebrate cultural identity and originality.

Empowerment

We support small creators and ethical businesses.

Sustainability

We believe in conscious consumption and eco values.
pages.styles: #bazaar-about-hero { background-color: #c0392b; color: white; padding: 80px 0; } #bazaar-values i { color: #e74c3c; }

pages.title: Our Collections
pages.description: Explore curated collections from artisans around the world.
pages.keywords: collections, catalogs, bazaar, global, handmade, culture
pages.content:
Browse Our Collections

Unique products inspired by cultural heritage and global creativity
pages.styles: #bazaar-collections { background-color: #fbeee0; color: #3d2c1e; } #collections-grid .card { border: none; transition: transform 0.3s; } #collections-grid .card:hover { transform: scale(1.03); box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); }

pages.title: All Products
pages.description: Discover a world of handcrafted and exclusive products.
pages.keywords: products, items, bazaar, shop, handmade, exclusive
pages.content: Shop All Products
pages.styles: #bazaar-products { background-color: #fffaf5; color: #2c2c2c; } #products-grid .card { border: none; background-color: #ffffff; transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; } #products-grid .card:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); }

pages.title: Product Detail
pages.description: View detailed information about this product.
pages.keywords: product, details, shop, bazaar, buy, ecommerce
pages.content:
Product Name

A short description of the product goes here.

€49.99
pages.styles: #bazaar-product { background-color: #fefaf0; color: #333; } #bazaar-product img { border-radius: 8px; } #bazaar-product h2 { color: #b3541e; } .btn-dark { background-color: #b3541e; border: none; } .btn-dark:hover { background-color: #944313; }

pages.title: Your Cart
pages.description: Review and manage the items in your shopping cart.
pages.keywords: cart, shopping cart, checkout, ecommerce, bazaar
pages.content:
Shopping Cart

Product Name
Short description or variant
€49.99

Total: €149.97

Proceed to Checkout
pages.styles: #bazaar-cart { background-color: #fff8f0; color: #3c3c3c; } #bazaar-cart img { max-height: 80px; } .btn-dark { background-color: #b3541e; border: none; } .btn-dark:hover { background-color: #944313; } .btn-outline-danger { border-color: #b3541e; color: #b3541e; } .btn-outline-danger:hover { background-color: #b3541e; color: white; }

pages.title: Contact Us
pages.description: Get in touch with our support team
pages.content:
We’d Love to Hear from You

Need help or want to send us a message?

  • +39 0123 456789
  • support@bazaarshop.com
  • Via del Commercio 12, Roma
pages.styles: #bazaar-contact { background-color: #fff4ea; color: #3c3c3c; } .btn-dark { background-color: #b3541e; border: none; } .btn-dark:hover { background-color: #944313; }

pages.title: Special Offer
pages.content:
Exclusive Bazaar Event

Join us for an unforgettable shopping experience with discounts up to 50%.

Discover Deals
pages.styles: #bazaar-landing { background: linear-gradient(to right, #f3c98b, #fff8f0); color: #3c3c3c; } .btn-dark { background-color: #b3541e; border: none; } .btn-dark:hover { background-color: #944313; }
